name: Pepo (itch)
description:
Join Pepo in his journey!

Pepo should look for Mika in an unforgettable journey full of puzzles and incredible friends. Discover his amazing powers and how he use them, and help him to find his owner.

Thank you for playing Pepo!

Twitter: @pepotvg

Website: http://www.pepothecat.com
